DOC.brief_summary: This study design check effect use ear popper device serous otitis medium child conductive hearing loss accompany otitis . It intend 30 child age 3-18 year participate study . The inclusion criterion : clinical serous otitis medium duration 3 month , conductive hearing loss least 15 decibel air bone gap tympanometry type B C. The child use ear popper 7 week . They undergo otologic examination , audiometry tympanometry begin ao trial , 7 week 3 month begin trial . The otologic finding audiometry tympanometry result trial compare . We try determine whether use ear popper test group improve conductive hearing loss prevent need tympanostomy tube insertion .
DOC.brief_title: The Influence The Ear Popper Serous Otitis Media Accompanying Conductive Hearing Loss Children
